state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- You have entered the most typical of all possible bedrooms. You see a closed chest drawer nearby. You make out an antique trunk. As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a king-size bed. However, the king-size bed, like an empty king-size bed, has nothing on it. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
You open the antique trunk, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2
admissible_commands: take old key from antique trunk
optimal_action: take old key from antique trunk

state: -= Kitchen =- You're now in a kitchen. Let's see what's in here. You can see a refrigerator. Hmmm... what else, what else? You can make out a counter. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What's that over there? It looks like it's a stove. The stove is normal. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You see a kitchen island. On the kitchen island you see a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island
